page.title: 15TOURISM
page.content:
produce taller,stronger types of trees.The testing of weedkillers is done to find the most suitable.
TOURISM - Rosslyn Chapel is a 15th century medieval church renowned for it's Apprentice Pillar.The pillar was sculptured by an apprentice while his master mason was visiting Rome.On his return the master killed the apprentice in a jelous rage.In 1984 , 1400 tourists visited it. HOTELS - The Original Hotel,built in 1892,as a coaching inn and the Royal Hotel,cater for tourists.There is also the Pentland Caravan Park situated west of the A701.There are about 25 mobile homes for hire to holiday makers.There is space for 50 touring caravans or tents.Services include toilets,showers,shops,a fast food shop,and a recreation area.
